name: Ensnaring Wrappings
summary: Some of your wrappings come loose to ensnare a creature you recently damaged.
description:
Some of your wrappings come loose to ensnare a creature you recently damaged. You attempt to Grapple the creature you damaged.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
trigger: Your Strike deals physical damage to a creature that is within reach of your arms and isn't more than one size larger than you.
